sentences.english: Methods Experimental asthma model of guinea pigs was induced by ovalbumin in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 方法以卵白蛋白致敏豚鼠制备哮喘模型。

sentences.english: Sometimes by the arm imply the whole metal piece of HSA.
sentences.chinese: 有时候暗示的手臂的人血清白蛋白全金属片。

sentences.english: Initially as edema, hypoalbuminemia and blood concentration.
sentences.chinese: 起初为水肿，低白蛋白血症和血液浓缩。

sentences.english: Some tests, such as albumin and bilirubin , do.
sentences.chinese: 一些测试，如白蛋白和胆红素，这样做。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the interaction between p-hydroquinone and serum protein.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨对苯二酚与血清白蛋白的相互作用。

sentences.english: The factors of influence on the polarographic determination were investigated and discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 对影响白蛋白测定的诸因素作了详细研究和讨论。

sentences.english: Losartan can suppress urinary albumin and glomerular hypertrophy in renal tissue.
sentences.chinese: 氯沙坦可降低尿白蛋白及阻遏早期肾小球肥大。

sentences.english: Because it slowly dissociates from the albumin, it is available to the body over an extended period.
sentences.chinese: 因为它慢慢从白蛋白游离，它可对人体多长时间。

sentences.english: The fluorescence of tryptophan residue in BSA was quenched by benzoate.
sentences.chinese: 白蛋白中色氨酸残基的荧光被苯甲酸钠淬灭。

sentences.english: Prealbumin in plasma was improved in TNA group.
sentences.chinese: 血浆前白蛋白明显增高。

sentences.english: The function of the albumen cells is not known.
sentences.chinese: 白蛋白细胞的功能尚不清楚。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the associations of the albumin with the toxicity titer.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析白蛋白含量与病毒毒力滴度高低的相关程度。

sentences.english: The process of the acid-induced denaturation of albumin was studied by using a dynamic laser speckle method in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 利用动态激光散斑法研究了白蛋白的酸致变性过程。

sentences.english: Purpose The aim was to study the chemical mechanism of air-filled albumin microspheres prepared by sonication.
sentences.chinese: 探索声振制备空气白蛋白微球的化学原理。
